thread.title: BRIEF-PNM Resources Expects To Affirm Co's 2018 Consolidated EPS Guidance Of $1.82 To $1.92

title: BRIEF-PNM Resources Expects To Affirm Co's 2018 Consolidated EPS Guidance Of $1.82 To $1.92

organizations.name: brief-pnm resources expects to affirm co

text: March 13, 2018 / 10:51 AM / Updated 10 minutes ago BRIEF-PNM Resources Expects To Affirm Co's 2018 Consolidated EPS Guidance Of $1.82 To $1.92 Reuters Staff March 13 (Reuters) - PNM Resources Inc: * PNM RESOURCES MANAGEMENT TO MEET WITH INVESTORS * EXPECTED TO AFFIRM COMPANY’S 2018 CONSOLIDATED EARNINGS GUIDANCE OF $1.82 TO $1.92 PER DILUTED SHARE * FY2018 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $1.84 — THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S * ‍ 2019 CONSOLIDATED EARNINGS GUIDANCE OF $2.04 TO $2.16/DILUTED SHARE​ * FY2019 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $2.07 — THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
